items.title: Insta360’s latest Flow 2 Pro smartphone gimbal with Apple DockKit subject-tracking, gesture control hits $127 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Insta360’s official storefront offering its latest Flow 2 Pro smartphone gimbal standard bundle for $126.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year in January carrying a $160 price tag. It dropped to the $136 mark for the first time a few months back, and its current fall Prime Day offer takes 21% off its usual going rate. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this gimbal, and it’s now fetching $9 less than its previous low and our mention from July. Both black and white variants of this gimbal have hit the $127 low today, and you’ll find its Creator bundle with some neat extras fetching $132.99 shipped instead of its usual $190 price. Head below for more details.

more…

While some models have jumped back up, or are slightly higher than they were, models like the Beats iPhone 17 Pro Max Kickstand Case with MagSafe and Camera Control are now starting down at new $44 all-time lows. items.title: Fall Prime Day price still live on Hyperkin’s Xbox 360-style wired gamepad for PC, Series X|S down at $29 (Save 42%)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that gets you Hyperkin’s Xbox 360-style Xenon wired controller in white for Series X|S and PC for $21.29 Prime shipped. Folks without a Prime membership can dodge the shipping fee by checking out with items worth over $35 in the cart. This is regularly a $50 gamepad, which is now seeing a 42% discount. This fall Prime Day discount shaves $21 off its usual going rate, landing it $2.50 below its previous all-time low. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this model, so be sure to snag it before it jumps back to its full price. You can get this in a handful of other colors, and they’re all discounted at the moment, albeit with relatively lighter deals. Head below for more details.
